author: Anonymous Scale
title: Question for Syllabus
question:
You must pass the combined average of midterm 2 and the final exam to pass the course. Any student who fails the combined average of these two exams will receive a grade of no higher than 45% for the course.
In this criteria, what is numerical passing combined average ?  (is it 70% ?)
student_answer:
This means you must obtain at least
50
%
or above on the combined average of midterm
2
and the final. So if your score on midterm
2
was less than
50
%
, you would need to score higher than
50
%
on the final in order for the weighted average of both MT
2
and the final to be
>=
50
%
.
